page.title: 18Clubs in Longworth
page.content: There are a lot of clubs in Longworth and Hinton. Most of them meet in Longworh Village Hall though some are held in Southmoor. For the youngest children there is a play group and a Mothers and Toddlers group. We have Football after school and there are Guides,Scouts,Cubs as well as the Youth Club and Tuesday Club for us. The Scouts have a band which takes part in competitions all over the country and is very good. For grown ups there is the WI, Keep Fit, Judo, Bingo and the choir. A lot of old people belong to the Good Neighbours Club which meets every other Tuesday.
